title: Roadworks cause delays on A2 at New Cross
content:
Roadworks are causing commuter chaos on the A2 at New Cross. 
 
Traffic is queuing both ways between on New Cross Road both ways between A20 (New Cross Gyratory) and A2210 / Deptford Broadway (Deptford Bridge). 
   
 Share article  
   
Highways Agency officials are warning motorists to expect delays.
